statements: SELECT * FROM parts_inventory;
SELECT part_name, part_quantity FROM parts_inventory WHERE part_quantity > 10;
SELECT part_name, part_quantity FROM parts_inventory ORDER BY part_quantity DESC;
SELECT part_category, COUNT(*) AS total_parts FROM parts_inventory GROUP BY part_category;
SELECT part_name, purchase_date FROM parts_inventory WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM parts_inventory WHERE part_category='Electronics' ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT part_name, part_category, part_quantity FROM parts_inventory WHERE part_quantity > 50 ORDER BY part_quantity DESC;
SELECT part_id, part_supplier, purchase_date FROM parts_inventory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT part_category FROM parts_inventory WHERE part_supplier='ACME Electronics' ORDER BY part_category ASC;

SELECT part_id, part_name, part_quantity, part_supplier FROM parts_inventory WHERE part_quantity < 10 OR (part_category='Mechanical' AND part_supplier='Widget Co.') ORDER BY part_quantity, part_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM parts WHERE part_id = 1;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM parts WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY part_name DESC;
SELECT part_name, price FROM parts WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM components INNER JOIN parts ON components.part_id = parts.part_id;
SELECT component_name, parts.part_name FROM components JOIN parts ON components.part_id = parts.part_id ORDER BY component_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM parts WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT part_name, quantity, price FROM parts ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT component_name, p.part_name FROM components c JOIN parts p ON c.part_id = p.part_id WHERE c.component_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM parts JOIN components ON parts.part_id = components.part_id WHERE parts.quantity > 50 AND components.component_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM Parts;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Parts ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Components WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, name FROM Assemblies WHERE quantity = 1;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM Parts WHERE name LIKE '%screw%';
SELECT * FROM Parts WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT name FROM Components WHERE quantity <= 5 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, name FROM Assemblies WHERE quantity = 0 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM Parts p INNER JOIN Components c ON p.id = c.part_id WHERE p.quantity >= c.quantity AND p.id = 3 ORDER BY p.id ASC
SELECT a.name, c.name, p.quantity FROM Assemblies a INNER JOIN Components c ON a.component_id = c.id INNER JOIN Parts p ON c.part_id = p.id WHERE a.quantity > 1 ORDER BY p.quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM parts;
SELECT part_id, part_name, quantity FROM parts ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM components WHERE component_id = 3;
SELECT part_name, price FROM parts WHERE price > 100;
SELECT part_id, warehouse_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity, price FROM parts WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.part_name, i.quantity, w.location FROM parts p JOIN inventory i ON p.part_id = i.part_id JOIN warehouses w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM components c JOIN parts p ON c.part_id = p.part_id;

SELECT p.part_name, w.location, i.quantity FROM parts p JOIN inventory i ON p.part_id = i.part_id JOIN warehouses w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE i.quantity > 0 ORDER BY w.location ASC, i.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM parts ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT part_id, price FROM parts WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT part_name, vendor_name FROM parts JOIN inventory ON parts.part_id = inventory.part_id JOIN vendors ON inventory.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id;
SELECT transaction_date, quantity FROM transactions WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT part_name, price FROM parts WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT component_name, part_name, quantity FROM components JOIN parts ON components.part_id = parts.part_id;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) FROM vendors JOIN inventory ON vendors.vendor_id = inventory.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT part_name, component_name, quantity FROM parts JOIN components ON parts.part_id = components.part_id WHERE quantity < 50;
